name: PAT_ENC_DISP_CMTS
description: This table contains the disposition comments for a patient's ED visit.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the encounter associated with these Disposition comments.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the Disposition comment.

columns.name: ED_DISPOSITION_NTS
columns.description: The Disposition comments for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
